content: the **framed circles granny square** combines two fun granny techniques and patterns the circle to square granny square for the center and the half-and-half granny square for the border > this pattern is my contribution to the > ** granny stitch sampler blanket crochet along cal 1 ** hosted by > debbie of madame stitch visit this > page ** here 2 ** to find out all the > details and join the cal *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** aran 4 medium yarn 5 0 mm h/8 us 6 uk crochet hook tapestry needle **yarn & colors** i used a mix of **a** **stylecraft special aran*** 214 yds / 196 m per 100 g* and **b** **paintbox yarns simply aran** *201 yds / 184 m per 100 g* in the following colors **white** a cream 1005 **yellow** a gold 1709 **light green** b lime green 228 **dark green** b slate green 226 **pink** a pale rose 1080 feel free to use any yarn that meets gauge **size** 12 30 5 cm **gauge** 3 rounds in pattern in 3 35 8 5 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //raffamusa--madamestitch thrivecart com/2025-granny-stitch-blanket-pattern/68cc6a745d401/ 2 https //raffamusa--madamestitch thrivecart com/2025-granny-stitch-blanket-pattern/68cc6a745d401/
